key_risks: Regulatory and environmental risks due to changes in policies and scrutiny over plastic-based products
Raw material price volatility affecting margins and profitability
Supply chain vulnerabilities impacting production and delivery
Competitive pressures from domestic and international manufacturers
controversies: SEC charges for reporting and accounting violations in 2018
Ongoing labor disputes including unpaid overtime lawsuits and unfair labor practice cases
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of plastic-based products, particularly regarding production and disposal
social_issues: Labor disputes and potential reputational damage from unpaid overtime lawsuits and unfair labor practice cases
governance_issues: Concerns over financial transparency and governance due to past SEC charges
